name: Redemption Road Recovery
description: Redemption Road Recovery is a non-profit, Christ-centered treatment facility for men with addiction disorders located in Heidrick, Kentucky. The facility offers comprehensive addiction treatment programs including residential treatment, partial hospitalization, intensive outpatient, and outpatient programs. Services include addiction treatment, counseling, transitional services, and support for men to regain custody of children, pursue education, and find employment. The facility has been serving the community since 2015 and maintains a lower recidivism rate than the state average.
